article:
A farmer once owned an old mule .One day,the mule fell into a nearby well,and he began to   _   and made a lot of loud noise. After carefully assessing the   _  ,the farmer felt sympathy for the mule,but   _   that neither the mule nor the well was worth the trouble of saving,then he called his   _   together and told them what had happened and   _   them to help shovel  some dirt to bury the old mule in the   _   and put him out of his suffering.
Hearing many people coming to help,the old mule initially was   _  ...But as the farmer and his neighbors continued shoveling and the dirt hit his back,a thought suddenly   _   him. He was   _   that every time a shovel load of dirt landed on his   _  ,he should shake it off and step up!So he did,blow after blow.
He repeated "Shake it off and step up!" to   _   himself. No matter how painful the blows were,or how disappointing the situation seemed,the old mule just   _   on shaking it off and stepping up!
As you might have guessed,it was not long   _   the old mule finally stepped over the wall of the well,painful and tired. What would  otherwise   _   him,actually blessed him because of the manner in which he   _   his adversity .
  _   is life!As long as we face our problems and respond to them   _  ,and refuse to give in to panic,bitterness,or selfpity,the adversities that come along to bury us   _   have the potential to   _   and bless us!Forgiveness,tolerance,hope and perseverance are   _   in shaking it off and stepping up out of the well in which we find ourselves.
